rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with wheelchair accessible design, featuring a ramp and smooth transitions.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area that integrates natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed to be spacious for comfortable seating, wheelchair accessible pathways, and a focal point in the villa.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Open-plan dining area adjoining the living room with ample natural light and ventilation. Wheelchair accessible seating arrangements are incorporated.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Chettinad-style open-plan kitchen featuring high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation. Wheelchair accessible workspaces are included.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light, designed for comfort and privacy. Includes a built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with ample lighting and accessibility features, ideal for family members or guests.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to be spacious and well-ventilated, maintaining adherence to Vastu principles by aligning with natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom incorporating natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows, ensuring a comfortable living space.

rooms.name: Study/Recreation Room
rooms.description: Multipurpose room that can serve as a study or guest area. Designed with accessibility features and natural light.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, wheelchair accessible entrance door aligning with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy. Features automatic or easy-to-open mechanism.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
openings.description: Large windows in the living room and adjoining spaces to maximize natural light, ventilation, and views of the garden.

openings.name: Garden Entrance
openings.description: Access point from the main living area to the large garden, designed to allow seamless movement and integration with nature.

openings.name: Kitchen Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
openings.description: Large windows in the kitchen area to enhance natural light and ventilation, aligning with open-plan design.
